title: Dr. Mundo is SERIOUSLY BROKEN - plz Riot
body:
SIGH. Another mundo complaint thread - long story short; whole team had armour pen, magic pen, and grievous wounds, still wasnt enough to combat mundos ridiculous tankyness, literally 1 v 5ing us to the nexus, unstoppable and there was nothing we could do about it. Whats the point in playing this game if we cant counter a champions stupid abilities. unkillable, unkitable, UNWINNABLE
buff anti tank items or nerf mundo

replies.body: It's very simple - if you think a champion is broken, don't complain about it. Pick them, and get from silver 4 to challenger {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Youre missing the point of this whole thread
I just have one question : Was Dr Mundo already fed in the first place?
